markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skilled Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=3972) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 44</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Athamasi](/Heritages.aspx?ID=211) heritage or [Xyloshi](/Heritages.aspx?ID=215) heritage

</column>

---

You can navigate vertical surfaces with ease. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you also have the [Scuttle Up](/Feats.aspx?ID=3968) ancestry feat, your climb Speed increases to your land Speed when climbing trees or cavern walls.
name: Skilled Climber

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Skilled Climber Source Impossible Lands pg. 44 Prerequisites Athamasi heritage or Xyloshi heritage --- You can navigate vertical surfaces with ease. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you also have the Scuttle Up ancestry feat, your climb Speed increases to your land Speed when climbing trees or cavern walls.
